branchCategory.name: MLGC

branchItem.name: MLGC, Compact External Guide Cylinder with Fine Lock
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <li>Bore sizes: 20, 25, 32, 40 mm <li>Available in spring, pneumatic or both locking mechanisms <li>Available in basic or front flange mounting <li>Lockable in either extend or retract stroke <li>Air cushion as standard <li>Auto-switch capable </LI></UL>
